content: c-r.de: Christian Rossow Apply for a PostDoc/PhD position in my research group at CISPA in Dortmund, Germany. https://www.christian-rossow.de If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough. Christian Rossow Faculty at CISPA – Helmholtz Center for Information Security (dblp, Google Scholar, publications) mail: rossow [at] cispa . de (remove spaces) PGP key: FC5F D8C7 2B6A 3175 BA6B 4983 8FD7 468D 4C07 4C1D About me: I am Faculty at the Helmholtz Center for Information Security (CISPA), leading the System Security research group in Dortmund, Germany. At the same time, I am full professor at the CompSci faculty at TU Dortmund. I obtained my PhD from VU Amsterdam in 2013 and was professor at Saarland University until 2025. The primary interests of my research group centers on these areas: Software Security (e.g., exploitation, defenses) Network Security and Privacy Denial-of-Service Attacks and Defenses Community Services: I regularly act as reviewer for the most impactful venues in the cybersecurity context. Find below an incomplete subset of conferences I was involved in. Note that I generally decline invitations to review for journals given their lower impact/visibility in cybersecurity research. Track Chair (Network Security) at ACM CCS 2026.
